the house was nice and clean and very fast response with answers
great stay thank you

the host is very friendly and everything is super comfortable, 100% recommended

Had a fantastic stay at Laura's place! She's incredibly accommodating and responds promptly. The house was spotless, and the instructions provided were clear and easy to follow. We had plenty of space, and with everything conveniently close by, it made our stay even more enjoyable. Highly recommend!

Laura was an amazing host. We went to visist family in Andrews for the Thanksgiving holiday and needed to add a few more days to our stay; Laura was so helpful and accomodating. The muffins and note on check in were so sweet. There were plenty of towel and they were soft a fluffy! Check in was a breeze with simple insturcitons and the house was easy to locate. All the extras in the house were a nice touch, washing supplies, stocked kitchen, bathroom amenities, etc. We had a great time visiting family and a nice place to relax each night.
Laura is a great host—always very quick to respond and friendly!
Very clean and the kitchen was well stocked. We really enjoyed our time at the house and the cookies left for us was a nice touch.
The place is cozy and quaint. It feels like my grandmother's house, in a good way. The host was always responsive and helpful. We will be staying here again.
It was great

Quiet street. Well equipped kitchen and laundry room. Enjoyed sitting outside in the back patio. Comfy beds and plenty of clean towels.
Perfect for our weekend at a wedding.

Great stay, very cozy and clean home, great location and communication, only downside was having only one shower for everyone to use. Two bathrooms in home one in master bedroom with a shower and one in hallway with a tub no shower.

The house was amazing! It was very well stocked and the location was amazing. So close to the local park. We walked to it for some festival. The host was very responsive when we had a question. The beds were super comfy and it was perfect for what we needed. We will definitely be staying again.
Great place and a very fair price. Laura was very quick to respond and very helpful
Great Airbnb, very clean, easy checkin, and the homemade muffins were a nice touch!

We loved this bnb for our extended stay. Laura was super friendly and helpful. Our family was perfectly at home for the month we stayed. Laura checked in and tidied up weekly. She was respectful of our schedule. The house had everything we needed. Our kids loved the back yard. Let me tell you, the washer has an agitator & it got the yuckiest of toddler stains out!! 10/10 recommend. If we ever need a place to stay in Andrews again, we will reach out to see if this one is available.
This airbnb was excepcional. It was everything and more than we expected. I highly recommend it.
The home is beautiful and centrally located. Everything was spotlessly clean and Laura responded promptly to any messages. I’ll def be back.
Amazing house and a wonderful host! The location is central to everything, and the park is only a few blocks away.
We stayed at Laura’s place while in town for a family reunion. We’ll be back again next year.
very attentive host ,daughter left cookies she made ..how sweet

Laura is an amazing host and communicator. She left us cupcakes and a sweet welcome note. Her place was very homey and cozy, and had pretty much everything we needed. It was a great rest stop between our destinations.
Perfect place for a stopover with kids. Close to an awesome park and lots of room in the home. Very clean!

Comfortable living room with plenty of seating. Queen beds were perfect. Twin beds would be great for kids. Loved having bottled water, coffee ready to brew and homemade sugar cookies. Morning coffee on the backyard patio was cool and quiet. We will be back.
It was a great stay, again. Such a wonderful place to stay. Will return!
Laura is an amazing host! So accommodating and prompt in returning messages! The place was so cozy and felt like home!
Homemade cookies and sweet note upon arrival 😊 great backyard, plenty of space inside too! Nice stay!

Our stay here was awesome, very reasonably priced for the location!
We actually enjoyed 4 or 5 1 month stays here and we have no complaints. Laura even restocked the house and cleaned once a week, and was always very responsive anytime we had any questions.
Pretty good local restaurants in town as well.
Great place! 5 stars for sure!

Laura’s place met our needs perfectly!
Clean and comfortable, perfect for a long stay.

Five stars, Highly recommend!!

Wonderful home, delightful host, and budget friendly. Would definitely stay again.
Home is extremely clean. Furniture and beds very comfy. Home had things to tidy up with after meals or messes. Nice backyard. Quiet neighborhood.
Great host nice place plenty of parking for a trailer
Very cute house in a great neighborhood! Great place to stay!

I loved everything about this place
Beautiful home and location.. I would definitely book this home again for future stays.
Just the place we needed after a long drive. Clean, good location, and spacious!
Convenient location, good description, and clear instructions.
Always a great place when I’m in Lamesa for business.
Very nice home !!

This is our second stay at the Yellow Door and one of our favorites…. We will continue to be repeat customers as long as Jordan and Casey will have us! It’s a lovely home with comfortable beds in a beautiful neighborhood.
Beautiful home! Jordan was an excellent host and if we are ever in the area again we would definitely stay again!
Thanks for your business, very recommended
The best home away from home! Everything you could ever need is provided and truly feels like home! Every space is immaculate and highly recommend this home!
The house is as clean and had comfortable beds in the bedrooms
Great spot! Thank you

House was cozy, comfy and beautiful. We really enjoyed our stay despite visiting under sad circumstances for a funeral. Hosts were thoughtful, friendly and responsive. Highly recommend this gem of a home in Lamesa.

Jordan’s place was amazing for a one night stay on our road trip back home. It was cozy and convenient for the whole family and the pups. :) it’s decorated really beautifully and there was a ton of thoughtful touches that made it really special and shows the hosts want to go above and beyond. Thank you so much!
Wonderful home! Very cleaning and homey. Absolutely loved the Christmas tree!

Stay was great. Host was very responsive and check-in was easy. The home was clean and well-furnished. The neighborhood is one of the better ones in town. Overall, this was home was exactly what we hoped it would be.

This is the second time I’ve stayed at the Yellow Door. Both times the house was spotless. The Christmas decorations really stood out most for my recent stay.
The house is located in Patk Terrace, a very nice location. I was there 4 days and I only saw one car drive by, so it is indeed a private location. There are lots of windows in the kitchen and living areas.
The host was very accommodating with my arrival and departure dates.
Great property, great hosts - professional all the way round…
Absolutely perfect stay and could not have asked for anything else. The owners thought of every small detail that a family needs. Looking forward to staying again on our next visit.
My uncle and Aunt always request to stay at Jordan and Casey’s airbnb when they come to Lamesa, it is their favorite!
Great place. Roomy, clean and quiet. Will stay again.

Our family spent a few days in Lamesa for Thanksgiving. This was our first time not staying in a local hotel. We (Mom, Dad, and 3 elementary kids) highly recommend this home for your next stay. It is spacious, in a quiet neighborhood, providing all the same comfort from our home. Thank you to the hosts for offering a wonderful home to this community.

We our originally from Lamesa and came back home to spend Thanksgiving with our mom. It is great Lamesa has an Airbnb. This home is beautiful, modern, spacious and clean. The host provides everything you need for your stay! Highly recommended!
The house was great.

Jordan's place has been an excellent accommodation during our road trip. The house is spacious and nicely decorated. The primary shower is huge and the bed comfy. The fenced backyard was great for our pups to run after hours in the car. Quiet and safe neighborhood. The home has some rules (eg no pets on furniture) and check out tasks that I recommend reviewing before booking. I'd definitely recommend this home!
Our new spot to stay when we visit family in Lamesa!

We really enjoyed staying at Jordan’s place. It’s spacious, natural light, cozy, neat and clean. I’m very particular about smells: I am not happy when the house smells like an old place when not fully renovated and when there are too many detergents & scents. This house was perfect. The home also had a big fenced backyard and beautiful grass (they hadn’t had it in the pictures when I chose the place), so our dogs had such a great surprise, and I didn’t have to worry about having them on leash. Thank you for being a great host, Jordan!
The Yellow Door is in an awesome location. I don’t think I saw more than 3 cars drive by, it was a peaceful stay. Very clean and comfortable. I would definitely stay there again.

This place was so cute and clean and welcoming- I was genuinely bummed we only got one quick night there— it was great and in a nice, older neighborhood that has been kept up very well! It was precious and we felt very safe!
Spotlessly clean. Very well stocked in the kitchen, bathrooms, and laundry. Great location for us. Super communication - clean and concise. Couldn't ask for more. Thank you.
Beautiful home nestled in a nice neighborhood. As advertised!
The house was clean and comfortable. We enjoyed staying at Yellow Door.

Very comfortable remodeled home. Fresh, modern interior, large kitchen, big windows, 3 comfortable beds, washer/dryer in a laundry area, 2 clean bathrooms, tub, shower, all cooking utensils and pots/pans, coffee, soaps and shampoo, hairdryers. Only things I needed were clothes and groceries. Easy to find. Easy to get in. Quiet street. Walk to golf course. When i visit Lamesa again i hope this home will be available. Thank you!
It is hard to believe that a place this nice can be found in Lamesa TX
The yellow door is a great place to stay very roomy and comfortable. Would definitely recommend
Jordan and Casey were very responsive. They even let us check in a little early. It is a lovely home in a nice part of town. We were very comfortable during our stay.
Very quiet, clean, wonderfully remodeled. if ever the chance to be in Lamesa agin I'll stay here again.
Place was beautiful… bed were amazingly comfortable… place was beautiful… this will definitely be a place we will go to again when we go back to visit family!!!
This house was amazing thank you for letting my in laws stay here! They also said your house is a beauty!

Jordan was very helpful and the whole stay went smoothly! Would definitely use this property again!
The Yellow Door is the perfect place when I come to Lamesa for work. Will definitely make reservations again.

My uncle, Aunt and cousin thoroughly enjoyed the home. They are excited to have a nice, clean, friendly place to stay when they come to Lamesa to visit. Their words “it was perfect and they have everything and more that you could need.”
We loved this house! It is peaceful and beautiful, well appointed and very clean. The hosts are great - responsive and easy to work with. If it's available, book it - you won't be sorry!

Thanks Jordan. Great place, was perfect.
Always good to be back in Lamesa.
Thank you!

We absolutely loved this place! I have stayed at TONS of Airbnb's and this is definitely one of my top 5! The simplicity of the design and interior was beautiful.

The pillows, beds and blankets were super comfy and the place was spotless! For being in such a small town this home was immaculate!
We'll be back for next year's Chicken Fried Steak Festival and will be booking again. 😊

There was a nice note waiting for us with a bottle of wine and a bag of Boom Chica Pop which we enjoyed after our long drive. There was so much space in the house, which was just beautiful. The master bedroom was big, well lit with the big window and oh so nice king bed. The bathroom was huge and nice. The kitchen was great and had everything we needed for the weekend. My family and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay and hope to get to go back again and again.
Place was exactly as posted. Beautiful home! Friendly and quick, excellent communicators! Will definitely stay here again!

The house was so warm and cozy over the Christmas holidays. There was even a beautifully decorated Christmas tree! Newly renovated with a beautiful master bed/bath. And my two teenage boys loved their rooms and bath. Thank you for such a wonderful stay. We will be back soon!
Great place to stay!! Will be back next time I’m in town!!

Sparkling clean, comfy and spacious.

This is an absolutely awesome place to stay. Kyle and his Dad were awesome. Friendly and very helpful. This is real Texas. Pasture, pump jacks, windmills, cotton. Beautiful sunsets viewed from rocking chairs on the porch. Grill to cook out. This was an amazing home.

This was the weekend of the grand opening for the West Texas Living Heritage Museum in Seminole Texas,and this country homes served the perfect getaway for guests to come and enjoy.
And I truly feel that it was meant to be that we could put our guest who were from the Comanche nation, making it like a homecoming to Gaines County, this beautiful country home just a little out of city limit where you have a clear view of the beautiful sunsets and sunrises that we are famous for here in West Texas.
The front porch rocking chairs was such a home like touch. And much appreciated. Coffee on the front porch in the morning, watching the sun come up sitting on the rocking chair in 2023 is a gift in its self.
We live in such a fast paced world, to take a moment in the on the front porch in the country is like a good summer rain in the desert. Highly recommend this beautiful home.
Thank you Kyle.

The place was very clean and spacious . Host was great and very responsive . However , feedback is to provide a better experience for future guests: ( we had 2 adults and 2 kids under 5 yrs)
1. There were no pool towels. We had to use bath towels, in which there were not enough towels because the "pool towels" became really dirty with the midland dust after taking outside
2. Kitchen is slim. 2 coffee mugs. 6 plates . 4 water glasses. No mixing type bowls/large salad/pasta bowls.There is no plastic in the place- so bringing a glass water cup outside was risky. It's pretty bare bones !
3. We had half a roll of paper towels and ran out quickly with no extras . No dish towels.
4. No laundry soap provided
5. Out of the 3 days we were there- the host showed up 2 times ( he messaged that he would have to drop by and clean the pool , and the meet a warranty repair person ) although host was accommodating and responsive - I still didn't want him dropping by at less than ideal hours .

It was just a good experience.
